thread.title: Newell CEO Defends Management Amid Activist Calls for Change

author: Sharon Terlep
title: Newell CEO Defends Management Amid Activist Calls for Change

organizations.name: newell ceo defends management amid activist calls for change newell brands inc

text:
Newell Brands Inc. CEO Mike Polk, facing a proxy fight with an activist investor seeking to oust him and the entire board, said a bruising retail environment and not management missteps are behind the company’s recent woes.
Mr. Polk on Friday addressed for the first time Newell’s clash with Starboard Value LP, which has aligned with three former executives of Jarden Corp. in a campaign to change course at the company. Newell bought Jarden less than two years ago in a $15 billion deal.
...
